SELECT proj.id as id, proj.name as name, prop.text_value as gateId FROM projects proj LEFT JOIN properties prop ON prop.resource_id=proj.id AND prop.prop_key='sonar.qualitygate' AND prop.text_value = #{query.gateId} where proj.qualifier = 'TRK' and proj.enabled = ${_true} and proj.main_branch_project_uuid is null and proj.copy_component_uuid is null and proj.organization_uuid=#{query.organizationUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and prop.text_value IS NOT NULL
and prop.text_value IS NULL
and (proj.kee = #{query.projectSearch} or upper(proj.name) like #{query.projectSearchUpperLikeSql} escape '/')
order by proj.name

SELECT text_value FROM properties
AND resource_id=#{componentId} AND prop_key='sonar.qualitygate'
